message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your company.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. This is still a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
